CustomListPreference - Class in com.aliceapps.custompreferences.listPreference
CustomListPreference shows custom ListPreference dialog CustomListPreference works the same way as ListPreference, but shows custom dialog with custom layout How to use it in preferences.xml file:

CustomPreferenceManager - Class in com.aliceapps.custompreferences
Static class to start custom Preference dialogs In your Preference fragment override onDisplayPreferenceDialog method and call showCustomDialog method in there
CustomPreferenceManager() - Constructor for class com.aliceapps.custompreferences.CustomPreferenceManager
 
CustomTimePreference - Class in com.aliceapps.custompreferences.timePreference
CustomTimePreference shows custom Time Picker dialog CustomTimePreference saves the time in the number of minutes since midnight How to use it in preferences.xml file:

CustomTimePreference.SimpleSummaryProvider - Class in com.aliceapps.custompreferences.timePreference
A simple Preference.SummaryProvider implementation for an CustomTimePreference.
